The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
British Football School provide fun and interactive training sessions, designed to meet with the exact needs of each school and the children that are taking part.
Our after school Football Club has been developed from the English Football Association’s training guidelines and is tailored to complement the school’s Physical Education curriculum.
A former Liverpool FC academy coach will lead the 2014 trainings. The sessions will be open for all students who are currently in years 2 – 6.
Please contact info@britishfootballschool.com for further details.
Sessions will run from 3.45pm - 5pm. British Football School coaches will meet those children on the lower campus at the start of the session. All collections must be made from the upper campus at 5pm.
VENUE: Upper Campus indoor sport halls
COST: 1500rb per session, discounts available;
- Returning discount - 10% off if payment is made before first session attended in 2014 - Electronic discount - 10% off if you book at any time with us via a bank transfer, credit or debit card via our website or at the sessions - Family and friend discount - 10% off if more than one family member attends our sessions - Monthly discount -10% off if you book a full month of sessions with us (4 sessions) - Term discount – 10% off if you book a full term of sessions with us (12 sessions)
EQUIPMENT: Full PE kit. Shin pads and trainers.
OTHER: A water bottle and healthy snack is advised.
BOOKING: Pre-booking is required. All players must register with British Football School before they play. Please register now online at: http://www.britishfootballschool.com/register-now"
Adam Hoult Head of Physical Education The International School of Moscow World Class Education
